meanings.sent1: When the baby is hungry, he will bawl until he gets food.
meanings.sent2: The child started to bawl when she lost her favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: During the sad movie, the audience couldn't help but bawl at the emotional scenes.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds seemed to bawl as the thunder roared across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The injured puppy continued to bawl until the vet arrived to help.

meanings.sent1: The bawl of the newborn echoed through the hospital ward.
meanings.sent2: The bawl of the wolf could be heard in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The bawl of the seal at the zoo made the visitors giggle.
meanings.sent4: The bawl of the wind through the trees created an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The bawl of the injured bird caught the attention of the park ranger.
